title: Client Settings aren't Changing
body:
It has been an issue for a few patches now, but I'm unable to save any of the setting changes I make in the client.

For example, under the [Client / Sound] settings, I have "Play Login Music" unchecked. After checking the box and clicking "DONE", the setting stays unchecked the next time I go into the settings. 

I have tried doing an "Initiate Full Repair" under the [Client / General], but that hasn't changed anything. 

Thanks in advance for any assistance.

replies.body:
Let's try forcing your config settings to reset entirely to see if that's the main issue. Run through these steps one by one, and let me know afterward if those settings still won't let you change them!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

The In-Game settings reset, so I had to readjust those again, but the Client settings still aren't saving properly.

Once I completed the listed steps, I tried turning on the login music and changing the window size, and neither worked. 

On a sidenote though, I had another issue where the Honor Rework screen popped up everytime I logged in, but that seems to have been solved.
